fields.name: AccessTier
fields.description: Required for storage accounts where kind = BlobStorage. The access tier is used for billing. The 'Premium' access tier is the default value for premium block blobs storage account type and it cannot be changed for the premium block blobs storage account type.

fields.name: AllowBlobPublicAccess
fields.description: Allow or disallow public access to all blobs or containers in the storage account. The default interpretation is true for this property.

fields.name: AllowCrossTenantReplication
fields.description: Allow or disallow cross AAD tenant object replication. The default interpretation is true for this property.

fields.name: AllowSharedKeyAccess
fields.description: Indicates whether the storage account permits requests to be authorized with the account access key via Shared Key. If false, then all requests, including shared access signatures, must be authorized with Azure Active Directory (Azure AD). The default value is null, which is equivalent to true.

fields.name: AllowedCopyScope
fields.description: Restrict copy to and from Storage Accounts within an AAD tenant or with Private Links to the same VNet.

fields.name: AzureFilesIdentityBasedAuthentication
fields.description: Provides the identity based authentication settings for Azure Files.

fields.name: BlobRestoreStatus
fields.description: Blob restore status

fields.name: CreationTime
fields.description: Gets the creation date and time of the storage account in UTC.

fields.name: CustomDomain
fields.description: Gets the custom domain the user assigned to this storage account.

fields.name: DefaultToOAuthAuthentication
fields.description: A boolean flag which indicates whether the default authentication is OAuth or not. The default interpretation is false for this property.

fields.name: DnsEndpointType
fields.description: Allows you to specify the type of endpoint. Set this to AzureDNSZone to create a large number of accounts in a single subscription, which creates accounts in an Azure DNS Zone and the endpoint URL will have an alphanumeric DNS Zone identifier.

fields.name: Encryption
fields.description: Encryption settings to be used for server-side encryption for the storage account.

fields.name: FailoverInProgress
fields.description: If the failover is in progress, the value will be true, otherwise, it will be null.

fields.name: GeoReplicationStats
fields.description: Geo Replication Stats

fields.name: ImmutableStorageWithVersioning
fields.description: The property is immutable and can only be set to true at the account creation time. When set to true, it enables object level immutability for all the containers in the account by default.

fields.name: IsHnsEnabled
fields.description: Account HierarchicalNamespace enabled if sets to true.

fields.name: IsLocalUserEnabled
fields.description: Enables local users feature, if set to true

fields.name: IsNfsV3Enabled
fields.description: NFS 3.0 protocol support enabled if set to true.

fields.name: IsSftpEnabled
fields.description: Enables Secure File Transfer Protocol, if set to true

fields.name: KeyCreationTime
fields.description: Storage account keys creation time.

fields.name: KeyPolicy
fields.description: KeyPolicy assigned to the storage account.

fields.name: LargeFileSharesState
fields.description: Allow large file shares if sets to Enabled. It cannot be disabled once it is enabled.

fields.name: LastGeoFailoverTime
fields.description: Gets the timestamp of the most recent instance of a failover to the secondary location. Only the most recent timestamp is retained. This element is not returned if there has never been a failover instance. Only available if the accountType is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS.

fields.name: MinimumTlsVersion
fields.description: Set the minimum TLS version to be permitted on requests to storage. The default interpretation is TLS 1.0 for this property.

fields.name: NetworkAcls
fields.description: Network rule set

fields.name: PrimaryEndpoints
fields.description: Gets the URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue, or table object. Note that Standard_ZRS and Premium_LRS accounts only return the blob endpoint.

fields.name: PrimaryLocation
fields.description: Gets the location of the primary data center for the storage account.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
fields.description: List of private endpoint connection associated with the specified storage account

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Gets the status of the storage account at the time the operation was called.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Allow or disallow public network access to Storage Account. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

fields.name: RoutingPreference
fields.description: Maintains information about the network routing choice opted by the user for data transfer

fields.name: SasPolicy
fields.description: SasPolicy assigned to the storage account.

fields.name: SecondaryEndpoints
fields.description: Gets the URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue, or table object from the secondary location of the storage account. Only available if the SKU name is Standard_RAGRS.

fields.name: SecondaryLocation
fields.description: Gets the location of the geo-replicated secondary for the storage account. Only available if the accountType is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS.

fields.name: StatusOfPrimary
fields.description: Gets the status indicating whether the primary location of the storage account is available or unavailable.

fields.name: StatusOfSecondary
fields.description: Gets the status indicating whether the secondary location of the storage account is available or unavailable. Only available if the SKU name is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS.

fields.name: StorageAccountSkuConversionStatus
fields.description: This property is readOnly and is set by server during asynchronous storage account sku conversion operations.

fields.name: SupportsHTTPSTrafficOnly
fields.description: Allows https traffic only to storage service if sets to true.
